subject: Horse Racing
Street Sense (Race Horse)
Horses
lead_paragraph: The Travers will serve as a glaring example of the new realities of horse racing, a sport in which the competitors seem to be merely auditioning for the booming breeding industry.
snippet: The Travers will serve as a glaring example of the new realities of horse racing, a sport in which the competitors seem to be merely auditioning for the booming breeding industry.
